hero.description: A comprehensive contest management system for high school Python programming competitions. Identifying and nurturing young talents in computer science.

mission.title: Context &
mission.description1: Programming contests are crucial for nurturing talent, but the current organization process (registration, mentoring, results) is often manual and fragmented.
mission.description2: InnoCode Challenge streamlines this with a centralized multi-school management system, automated judging, and real-time analytics.

realTimeExecution.title: Centralized Management
realTimeExecution.description: Unified portal for schools to register teams and mentors to track student progress.

globalLeaderboards.title: Automated Judging
globalLeaderboards.description: Instant, secure Python code grading ensuring fairness and transparency.

instantFeedback.title: Real-Time Analytics
instantFeedback.description: Live leaderboards and comprehensive reporting for seamless contest management.

admin.title: Admin
admin.description: See activity logs from other users and manage system resources.

staff.title: Staff
staff.description: Manage schools offered by school managers and review creation requests.

organizer.title: Organizer
organizer.description: Create contest flows and manage competition schedules.

student.title: Student
student.description: Join contests and compete in programming challenges.

mentor.title: Mentor
mentor.description: Create teams to allow students to join contests.

judge.title: Judge
judge.description: Perform manual evaluation for tests requiring human actions.

cta.title: Ready to Compete?
cta.description: Join the platform serving both talent development and university recruitment.
